path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - DragonSB Token - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Token owner can mint unlimited amount of tokens
findings.description: Token contract contains mint function for onlyOwner so owner of contract can mint unlimited amount of tokens without any cap.

findings.title: Version of solidity is too old
findings.description: The project uses Solidity 0.6.12 which was released in July 2020, but the latest version of solidity is currently 0.8.9 with various compiler bugs fixed.
